content: the catherine s wheel stitch is a daisy farm crafts staple and fan favorite hannah of daisy farm crafts designed the classic catherine s wheel blanket to help any crocheter master the skill this easy pattern features simple stitches such as chains single_crochet and double_crochet along with fun colorwork finish up your blanket with a cute single_crochet border made in caron simply soft a versatile worsted weight yarn that is soft to the touch and available in a variety of shades
